document.full_text: boeing co  may be leaning toward building a new version of its best-selling 737 narrowbody jet, but industry experts said on tuesday the company seems to be conflicted on the matter and appears increasingly less likely to make a decision in the next few months.
document.title: boeing appears conflicted on 737 decision: experts
lines_and_colors: boeing co  may be leaning toward building a new version of its best-selling 737 narrowbody jet, but industry experts said on tuesday the company seems to be conflicted on the matter and appears increasingly less likely to make a decision in the next few months.
